stringify: $(identity.pronouns.singular) has a constant wanderlust and is unable to live at the same place for more than a few months. {%chaotic+2}
$(identity.pronouns.singular) falls in and out of love easily.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) is always joking, even at innapropriate times.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) has a joke for every situation.{%cha+1}
$(identity.pronouns.singular) is constantly flattering people $(identity.pronouns.singular) talks to. {%cha+2}
$(identity.pronouns.singular) believes in whatever deity is most helpful to $(identity.pronouns.thirdPerson) at a given moment.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) always does what $(identity.pronouns.singular) is told not to. {%chaotic+2}
$(identity.pronouns.singular) gets very mad at any semblance of an insult.{%chaotic+2}
$(identity.pronouns.singular) dreams of becoming rich and famous.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) knows all the gossip around town.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) spaces out often, lost in thought.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) makes anyone $(identity.pronouns.singular) speaks to feel like the most important person in the world.{%cha+2}
$(identity.pronouns.singular) cares about $(identity.pronouns.possessive) friends and will do anything for them.{%good+1}
$(identity.pronouns.singular) loves discovering new mysteries and solving them.{%int+2}
$(identity.pronouns.singular) wants to know every side of a story before expressing an opinion.{%moralneutral+2}
$(identity.pronouns.singular) works hard to play hard afterwards.{%chaotic+1}
$(identity.pronouns.singular) stretches the truth to tell a good story.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) has a crude sense of humour.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) likes finding direct solutions to problems.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) doesn't like $(identity.pronouns.possessive) profession, has always dreamed of becoming a }{$quirks+$occupation}{$quirks+.{occupation}
$(identity.pronouns.singular) believes that all }{raceallergy}{$quirks+$racea}{$quirks+ are planning to destroy the world.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) goes out at night secretly looking for }{mundaneobject}
$(identity.pronouns.singular) owns a box full of dead animals.{%evil+1}
$(identity.pronouns.singular) goes to church to pick up sexual partners.{%cha+1}
$(identity.pronouns.singular) secretly wants to become the ruler of the city.
$(identity.pronouns.singular) is addicted to a local drug}{%str-1}{%con-1}
$(identity.pronouns.singular) is heavily addicted to an exotic drug}{%str-2}{%dex-2}{%con-2}{%int-2}{%wis-2}{%cha-2}
